author: namngrg
content: Hi, how can I convert `peer.ID` to `node.ID`? Issue is I cant exctract the node.ID from inbound connections so thinking if its possible to convert

author: pawandhananjay
content: you can do it for specific types of keys. Here's a lighthouse implementation https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/blob/3058b96f2560f1da04ada4f9d8ba8e5651794ff6/beacon_node/lighthouse_network/src/discovery/enr_ext.rs#L309-L351
